title: [HOLD for payment 2024-06-20] [$250] Delay in Accessing Thread After Deleting Parent Message Offline
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1, Open any chat and compose a message.
2, Reply to a message within the chat.
3, Go offline and delete the parent message.
4, Go back online.
5, Exit the thread by clicking the header.
6, Click on the reply notification and observe the delay in entering the thread.

Expected result: Immediate access to the thread upon clicking the reply notification when online

Actual result: None
